author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: لمّا قضی الأمر وأشرق نیّر الآفاق من شطر العراق أمرناهم بما یقدّسهم عن العالمین منهم من أخذ الهوی وأعرض عمّا أُمر ومنهم من اتّبع الحقّ بالهدی وکان من المهتدین
translation: When the time set for this Revelation was fulfilled, and He Who is the Daystar of the world appeared in ‘Iráq, He bade His followers observe that which would sanctify them from all earthly defilements. Some preferred to follow the desires of a corrupt inclination, while others walked in the way of righteousness and truth, and were rightly guided.
